name: @git-stunts/empty-graph
description: An experimental implementation of the WARP architecture

scripts.test: sh -c 'if [ "$GIT_STUNTS_DOCKER" = "1" ]; then vitest run test/unit "$@"; else docker compose run --build --rm test npm test -- "$@"; fi' --
scripts.benchmark: sh -c 'if [ "$GIT_STUNTS_DOCKER" = "1" ]; then vitest bench --run test/benchmark "$@"; else docker compose run --build --rm test npm run benchmark -- "$@"; fi' --
scripts.demo: cd examples && docker compose up -d && docker compose exec demo bash
scripts.demo:setup: cd examples && docker compose up -d && docker compose exec demo sh -c 'cd /app && npm install --silent && cd /demo && node /app/examples/setup.js'
scripts.demo:explore: cd examples && docker compose exec demo node /app/examples/explore.js
scripts.demo:inspect: cd examples && docker compose exec demo node /app/examples/inspect-index.js
scripts.demo:lagrangian: cd examples && docker compose exec demo node /app/examples/lagrangian-path.js
scripts.demo:bench-streaming: cd examples && docker compose up -d && docker compose exec demo node /app/examples/streaming-benchmark.js
scripts.demo:bench-traversal: cd examples && docker compose up -d && docker compose exec demo node /app/examples/traversal-benchmark.js

author: James Ross <james@flyingrobots.dev>
